titleStmt.title: How and rich an impartial account of the proceedings at the late election of burgesses for the burrough of Southwark : wherein are discovered the palpable forgeries of Elephant Smith in his pretended relation of the same / by one of the loyal inhabitants of that antient burrough.
titleStmt.author: One of the loyal inhabitants of that antient burrough.

notesStmt.note: Elephant Smith is Cave Underhill. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
